The Untold Story of the World's Biggest Diamond Heist

The Untold Story of the World’s Biggest Diamond Heist

Remarkably similar to all the Ocean’s Eleven movies, Ocean’s Thirteen in particular. Contains every element of a movie script including the old friend who’s probably not right for the job but is included out of loyalty. It strikes me that Wired probably isn’t the place for this amazing story. Via Waxy.

Mar 13th, 2009
